website_summaries.verdict: A single-ramp design that can hold a whopping 1,750 pounds, more than most of the competition.
pros: This trifold aluminum ramp will keep you from worrying about any slips with its 50-inch width
The fully welded aluminum is sturdy, and the ramp folds easily
Folded dimensions are 78 inches long by 17 inches wide by 6.75 inches high
cons: Shorter ramp means a steeper incline, and some customers reported that the safety straps were not included

customer_reviews.title: Actual ramp is shorter than described
customer_reviews.text: 4 out 5 only because the description is deceiving. The "overall" length counting the supports is 70", the actual ramp part is 65". Pretty steep going into a 3/4 ton 4x4. Take that into consideration when buying. Other than that, a really good ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Used to load Sportsman 500 into F250. Worked perfectly 4 trips. 5th trip, something went array and the far right clip (that sits on tailgate) broke off and I almost flipped off the truck. Called customer service and they promptly apologized and shipped my a new one. Exceptional customer service and will be recommending Yutrax to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far...
customer_reviews.text: I've only loaded once so far but initial results are good. My ATV is right at 1,000 lbs and I'm right at 300 lbs. That's stressful for any ramps... I got these because I knew the Harbor Freight choices probably couldn't handle it. These ramps are just wide enough, I have an inch to both sides and with the tri fold, I dont have to worry about going off inside the ramps. The ratchet straps they come with are a must have for keeping this connected to your truck. I chose the 78 inch to have a little better angle. I will update if anything goes wrong with my use going forward. Hopefully you see no updates from me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin from WV

customer_reviews.title: NOT For Sleds!
customer_reviews.text: NOT GOOD for snowmobiles. Before I purchased this I read plenty of reviews of how this ramp would be sufficient for snowmobiles. I have included a couple pictures of the ramp after 3 attempts to load. Note that I also have skid plates attached to the ramp. (Neccessary for snowmobile skis). The damage to the ramp is very obvious. Now this may be a great ramp for other applications, but I would strongly recommend you do not use this for snowmobiles. If it wasn't extremely damaged it would return or sell this ramp immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great rap at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I own an 800 lb Polaris sportsman and this ramp works great for it. It is wide enough (Barely) and long enough to get me on/off my truck. It seems sturdy enough however a little rickety. So far no complaints other than that but when put down on truck, it does not move around. MAKE SURE YOU USE THE STRAPS. Also, folds up nicely to fit in my 6.5ft bed. Fits like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Troy j.

customer_reviews.title: Will not work for snowmobiles
customer_reviews.text: This would probably work well on anything with tires but will not work with snowmobiles. I have a 2015 Skidoo 800 and got this to load into my truck. Set up was easy and the product is well built. Due to the nature of how snowmobiles need loaded from a ramp (minor ‘running’ start at the ramp from about 5-10’ back) the ramp’s bottom will slide forward no matter how tight you affix the straps. I even bought some heavy duty iron stakes and staked them down with no success. Just an FYI to snowmobilers I’m sure it works just fine eith anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Justice1776

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but able to secure to tailgate for loading. However, pay attention to length needed for safe loading of equipment. This is a shorter ramp and creates a steep angle for certain UTV/ATV's for today's trucks. Would buy again for a lower tailgate or trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to get our riding mower into the shed. This works perfectly. Size is long enough for the tractor to easily make it up and ramp is wide enough for our tractor. No issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Well-made. Relatively lightweight. Straps worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to get a motorcycle in and out of the vehicle and it works great. Straps hold it tight against the tailgate. It folds up, but it still pretty big for that up. But that is the way it is if you want a nice strong one. Natural aluminum color. Welds look really good. No sharp cuts or edges. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: M Peterson

customer_reviews.title: it is the perfect height and fit on my truck
customer_reviews.text: I read this was designed to perfectly fit the height of a stock 4x4 Silverado of the 2006 ish years. It is true, it is the perfect height and fit on my truck. This is a great product. Everyone always wants to borrow my ramp. We use this ramp for three wheelers and quads. Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: EASY to use!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these ramps for my 4 wheeler. I have a 2008 Honda Rincon that weighs easily 750lbs. big mud tires & all. I was looking for something durable & that would last but was easy enough for me to load & unload the 4 wheeler by myself without fear of not having the tires lined up correctly. The 2 straps provided definitely came in handy, very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica White

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome couldn’t be happier and have even been complimented on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ramp for a motorcycle knowing it is an ATV ramp. I modified one end and the middle ramps with plywood and sprayed the plywood with a non-slip truck bed liner. Works awesome couldn’t be happier and have even been complimented on the ramp.
customer_reviews.author: dave d.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a 1983 Honda 200S 3 wheeler that's only 300 lbs . But it's very well made with very professional welds . It says it will accommodate ATV up to 1750 lbs I personally saw an 800 pound 4 wheeler with a 250 pound man riding up the ramp it didn't flex a bit ...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Horsford

customer_reviews.title: Great product exactly as describe.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, just wish it was a little longer or my truck was closer to the ground. Feels safe and study. I use for a Quad into lifted 4x4 truck. Don't forget to strap it to the truck or it will be a widow maker..LOL
customer_reviews.author: Oceanus Ventures, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should. Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and strong. It handles a full size 850 4x4 Polaris no problem and is mandatory if you don’t want to end up on a YouTube video fail w 2 planks. Don’t be cheap. Back/neck surgery is going to seem expensive next to two planks you crashed off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I'm a cert
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I'm a cert. welder so I wanted a ramp that was welded, made very well and the welds are better than expected. I would buy this again very well made!
customer_reviews.author: cutter

customer_reviews.title: Wider then most and sturdy. Also will fit in 6.5ft truck bed with tailgate up
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these lamps. Very easy to setup, wider then most ramps. Have used them for dirtbikes and 4 wheelers. My dad is likes that these are wider then his and now wants to buy the same ones i bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ramps. All welded
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ramps. All welded, no rivets. Tri-fold is a must. Simple set up and take down, wish I had ordered sooner.
customer_reviews.author: V4

customer_reviews.title: Fits in 6.5' bed of Silverado 2500HD
customer_reviews.text: Great ramp. I wanted a long, wide, quality ramp that would fit in the standard bed (6.5') of my 2015 Silverado 2500HD and still be able to close the tail gate. This works perfectly with our Honda Rancher. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for ATVs into my truck bed
customer_reviews.text: Use this to load the kids ATVs into my truck. Works great on my Ram 2500 that sit pretty high with a 3 inch lift.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: just welds so it should be good for a long time
customer_reviews.text: My last ramp of this style lasted for many years and this one is built a little heavier with no rivets, just welds so it should be good for a long time. My latest ATV is wider than the old one so I needed the extra width as well.
customer_reviews.author: David M Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my rider mower to go into a new shed. It's strong but a bit awkward folding up to store inside shed.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I like Yutrax tri-fold
customer_reviews.text: This tr-fold works great. I have used it not only for my ATV but all loading and loading some heavy supplies onto my trailer. Very sturdy construction and light weight .
customer_reviews.author: W. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A must by if you have a ATV !
customer_reviews.text: Once you buy a set of these you will never want the dual ramps again I absolutely love these
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great ramps
customer_reviews.text: Great for loading our 4 wheeler into the truck. Easier than the 2 ramp style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great. fits in my crew cab bed with the ...
customer_reviews.text: very light, works great. fits in my crew cab bed with the tailgate up.
customer_reviews.author: pohlcat01

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. I added diamond plate ramps ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I added diamond plate ramps to this so I could load tool boxes. The 1750 lb. capacity was needed. The 1200 lb. ramps from Harbor Freight kept bending. These are much stronger, lighter, and more versitile.
customer_reviews.author: DodgeRam2500

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great ramp easy to use even for a78 year old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The ramps are wide enough and strong enough to support our Artic Cat 500. They fold up easily and are light weight. My only issue is the safety straps started fraying within a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: annw

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ramp
customer_reviews.text: Nice ramp. Loads my Yamaha quad up into my Ram 4x4 with no issues. Comes with straps that you can attach to the bumper to keep the ramp in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Friedman

customer_reviews.title: I have a 2001 Heritage Softail. I us this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2001 Heritage Softail. I us this to load it into the back of my truck. It works well but my truck is too high, so I have to use a hill too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Ramp. Compact and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Ramp. Compact and portable. It fits in My 2016 F-150 (6.5 foot bed) and allows the tail gate to close. It is long enough so that the slope is not too much to walk up. I added 3/4" plywood planks so that I can move items with smaller wheels up and down the ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W.

customer_reviews.title: Works for my purposes
customer_reviews.text: This has been working well. I use it to get my 1100 cc motorcycle over a one foot high step in and out of my garage. It is sturdy, but light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Phishrman

customer_reviews.title: Yutrax
customer_reviews.text: Works great! better than the one I borrowed glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: frank novak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with mediocre straps
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, right size for tailgate, straps are not so great and I used my ratchet straps instead, but used to unload some very heavy (150+lbs) furniture easily and safely.
customer_reviews.author: western read

customer_reviews.title: Solid, durable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Solid durable and light. Never any issues. It’s a little scary riding up a quad or dirt bike onto truck. Recommend finding a hill to put it on so it’s not so steep. If you get the longer one it’s better.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Yutrax ramp
customer_reviews.text: These work well to load my quad or dirt bike into the back of my stock Chevy 2500. If your truck is lifted I would recommend the longer ramps or making sure you have a incline that you can use to load and unload onto.
customer_reviews.author: wish'n i was fish'n

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, and perfectly much lighter than my steal made one. Dang, I'm gett'in older but smarter. Work smarter not harder.
customer_reviews.author: Secretariat

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: The ramp slips up every time I try to load the riding mower. I hate it and it’s not safe att all
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Solid - the straps are a pain just use your ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid - the straps are a pain just use your own tie downs for securing. Drove a Polaris 570 right down without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Supports every bit of the weight it says it does without bending.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Memmo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a little flimsy at first but when I put them to use this product works great and with the trifold it's easy to store away and get back out. Also, good price. Fits good in my 5.5' bed only if my tailgate is down or has no problem with the tailgate up if it's slanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and portable
customer_reviews.text: Love using this ramp to load my ATV into my truck. I don’t have to worry about possibly driving off of the edge of the two piece ramps anymore. It’s a solid build that’s easy to fold up and haul around.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Berntson

customer_reviews.title: Good deal and Great ramp!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment ever! Now my atv gets into the back of my pickup in minutes! Easy as pie and sturdy as hell!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I made a great choice when I choose this model. I have a 1150 pound golf cart and this ramp doesn't even flex while loading it on to my truck or my enclosed trailer. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: G. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a frame for my shed.. put treated 2x4's over top.. worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Lithoman

customer_reviews.title: Great ATV ramp -- works well with heavy ATVs and slightly lifted trucks.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I have two Can Am's and needed the extra strength.Long enough for loading ATVs in my truck without feeling like I'm shooting for the sky.... (4x4 with a 2" lift).

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Exactly what I needed to get my ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Exactly what I needed to get my JD mower into the shed.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to move around and store. Also seems pretty durable.

customer_reviews.title: Great for loading/unloading by yourself
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my 400ex four wheeler and it works amazing. The straps are easy to attach and unattach from the bumper. Had it about 2 months and not a problem. I load it unload by myself. I would definitely recommend these ramps
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable and easy to move and use
customer_reviews.text: They fold for storage. They are very well made and sturdy yet they are light enough that it makes them easy to move and use.We use the ramp for loading and unloading our TAB with a snow plow on the front

customer_reviews.title: Shed ramp
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove 1 section to fit. Very pleased with the outcome. Aluminum. Is great for outdoor use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the added length and is a very good product.

customer_reviews.title: It is strong and light
customer_reviews.text: I use it to load motorcycles into a pickup. I can walk up along side the bike. Folds up and fits in the bed of the truck.

customer_reviews.title: These things have been awesome and I have even used them on my golf ...
customer_reviews.text: These things have been awesome and I have even used them on my golf cart with no problem. FYI..my golfcart is heavier than the four wheeler.

customer_reviews.title: Weight and length and price.
customer_reviews.text: Ramp works great for our Graceland shed to ride a riding lawnmower right up in it.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but the rails could have been a little closer, other than that it's great.

customer_reviews.title: Great ramp well made.
customer_reviews.text: Get the longer ramp 70 inches a little to steep

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy ramp with a great price point.

customer_reviews.title: We think this is just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't tried it yet, but my husband likes it. We plan to use it to load our golf cart in the back of our truck when we go camping.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect ramp for loading/unloading my ATV. Its sturdy, wide, folds for storage. Its worth the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Safe Ramps
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this ramp. I purchased another one initially but they did not seem to be to sturdy when I was loading my 4 wheeler on to my pickup truck. The Yutrax Ramp solved the problem and I am very pleased with how well they work

customer_reviews.text: I use as ramp to get in a shipping container. Very effective in this capacity. It takes the weight of golf cart , riding lawnmower , and large four_wheeler without flexing. Straps are significant help in holding in place plus helps keep ramp folded when moving ramp.

customer_reviews.text: This order is a Christmas present for my son-in-law for Christmas it came withing 2 days of ordering and quality seems great!!

customer_reviews.title: Quality great but too short.
customer_reviews.text: I can't complain about the quality. I just wish it was 6 to 8" longer. My tractor bottoms out so badly that I can't drive it into my truck bed. I have a Nissan Frontier so the bed is not that high. I will have to figure out a way to extend them.

customer_reviews.title: They work but..
customer_reviews.text: the ramp works..conditionally. I bought the 70" for my frontier pro4x thinking it is a mid size truck, I don't need the extra length. Wrong. I need to park on a pretty good grade hill to get my 4 wheeler on and off. If your tires are wet or muddy they will not gain traction and climb up the ramp. The folding is awkward and I pinch my fingers every time I touch these. Again they work but not without plenty of pains through out the process of loading and unloading.

customer_reviews.title: Great for for a lightweight ramp
customer_reviews.text: Great for for a lightweight ramp. But if you're using it for riding mower and the mow deck sets low, it may catch on the center rails or hinges. It can be a bit awkward folding and unfolding, but at least the lightness of it doesn't make it a chore.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Securing Straps NOT Included (as noted in instructions)
customer_reviews.text: Ramps appear ok but disappointed that they did not come with the straps to attach to the hooks under bumper. Instructions say "Attach the two provided securing straps to the third cross tread from the tailgate end"? Guess I will order 2 extra tie downs and use them as it is not worth sending this back. Product looks OK but have not used yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great experience, Light weight, Included straps
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than other similar ramps I have used. So far has held up with no problems over multiple uses with a foreman 500. I didn't think I was going to like the straps that came with it but they have won me over

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This trifold ramp from YUTRAX has worked flawlessly, very sturdy construction. The safety straps hold it in place as advertised.Couldn't be more pleased.

customer_reviews.text: This ramp is perfect. Feel secure driving my Polaris 570 up without the fear of slipping. Really like the spaced out treads.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Oster

customer_reviews.title: Good ramp for big atc250 Honda 3 wheeler
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the trifold ramp. I have a Honda 250 big red 3 wheeler and is very easy to load and unload from pickup. Ramp is almost as wide as pickup bed. Pleased with the Amazon 2 day shipping also.All good and I would recommend getting the ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Yutrax 78-inch Tri-Fold XL Aluminum Truck, UTV/ATV Loading Ramps - 1750lb Capacity
product_meta.description: Style:78" Aluminum Tri-Fold RampExtra-long for taller vehicles the lightweight Yutrax TX104 tri-fold aluminum ramp provides extra strength and portability. The high load capacity provides peace of mind when loading virtually any cargo. Weighs only 32 pounds, with a weight capacity of 1,750 pounds. Open dimensions are 78 inches long by 50 inches wide. Folded dimensions are 78 inches long by 17.5 inches wide. Compact and easy to store when folded, ideal for short-bed trucks. Lightweight, fully-welded aluminum construction.
feature_bullets: Manufactured from high-strength, lightweight aluminum with an overall Weight of 32 lb making them easier to handle.
Heavy-duty hinges and joints that are welded, not riveted to give you peace of mind. 1,750 lb. weight capacity will easily support your ATV
When in use the TX102 sports a length of 78" is extra-long for taller vehicles with a width of 50" and folds to 17.5” in width for easy transport and storage

Extruded rectangular side rails resist bending, while the taller rectangular cross section supports more weight. Rubber-coated tab attachment points support ramp on vehicle without scratching. Includes adjustable safety straps to secure the ramp to your vehicle

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
